title: American Horror Story Season 8 Theme Apocalypse
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: I WAS SO EXCITEDD OMG I CANT WAIT FOR A TEASERRRRR

Okay so it’s pretty much confirmed that Evan is playing Michael😂. That makes me soooo efffing excited! I think for once this will be a newer season that is totally for “ the fans” , and it’s about time. Ryan’s best work is in the earlier seasons and i think they are the most popular, can’t wait! When Roanoke came out it was on my 17th birthday and i was sooo disappointed! I hope this season brings back fans that fell in love with the fantasy style of the first 3 seasons!
Its like a demonic Apocalypse. Omggg how cooooool. Im soooo gonna love this season so much.
I think the hand and the arm texture almost looks like the devil, and it would fit a satanic 'apocalypse' theme concerning Michael Langdon
Do you think they'll ever explain how there are so many God's in the AHS universe? Because we can confirm the voodoo Gods and old Gods along with the Christian God.
